name: Furnished  Rental
what_you_do: Marilynn Taylor is a licensed real estate investor and 20 year short term rental veteran, and an HGTV featured interior designer. She specializes in a guest focused, stress-free short term rental strategy.
who_you_serve: Short term rental hosts and investors looking to build wealth through real estate and short term rentals.
social_proof: Featured on multiple podcasts, including No Vacancy, Tribe Builders, Thanks for Visiting, and The Money Advantage.
signature_programs: Stress-Free Host Mentorship, 5 Star Profits Course, Vacation Rental Lease Templates & Training, Free Airbnb Listing Mentorship
business_focus: Helping short term rental hosts and investors build wealth through real estate and short term rentals.
service_provided: Short term rental coaching, mentorship, courses, lease templates, interior design
